estuary.view

Class Viewport

  • java.lang.Object
    • estuary.view.Viewport

  • public class Viewport
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows for mapping game coordinates to screen coordinates and vice-versa
    Author:
    Sean Rajkowski

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Viewport(int screenBeginX, int screenBeginY, int screenEndX, int screenEndY, double sightWidth, double sightHeight, Vector2 center)
      Constructor to create viewport based on the screen dimensions and the visible world coordinates
